snippet: Grammy-winning artist Chance the Rapper used a Friday sit-down with Illinois Gov. Bruce Rauner to press for immediate funding for cash-strapped Chicago Public Schools, but said he left "flustered" over "vague answers."...

headline.main: How the Amazon’s Cashews and Cacao Point to Cultivation by the Ancients
headline.print_headline: How the Amazon’s Cashews and Cacao Point to Cultivation by the Ancients

lead_paragraph: Grammy-winning artist Chance the Rapper used a Friday sit-down with Illinois Gov. Bruce Rauner to press for immediate funding for cash-strapped Chicago Public Schools, but said he left "flustered" over "vague answers."
